Question: In June 1969, the family moved to nearby Rockville Centre and this person transferred to South Side High School.
Hints: This person ran for 11 years until the last taped episode aired on July 8, 2005.
Cuomo was defeated in the gubernatorial election on November 8 by George Pataki, who this person backed.
